name: FiMFiction.net - Collapse Bulky UI Elements
description: This is an adaptation of Remove Obnoxious Items by waterpear. It removes or collapses elements which take up too much room on small screens.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.

additional_info:
• I don't actively use this script myself, so tell me immediately if something breaks.
  • I couldn't find a GIF to test with, so it's possible the GIF hiding is broken.
  • Because of how YouTube embeds work, the "Hover-Expand" option won't let you interact with the video after you've clicked play the first time. (Because clicking "Play" swaps in a Flash applet)
  • Got any more things that you think should be collapsed? Let me know.
